settings.item: 2 x Kyoto Robes, The Jumbo Towel, The Ranch Hat, valued at A$900
Mini Slit bag in Raffia and Calfskin, valued at A$1,850
Shimmer Oil, Mineral Shake Shake, and Classic Spray, valued at A$130

settings.ahg_description: Enter to win a collection of pieces with the summer heat in mind from our favourite brands. Total value of the winning prize, roughly $4,000 AUD.
settings.ahg_instructions: 1. Follow all participating brands on Instagram: @fellaswim — @robey.official — @vacationinc 2. Tag 3 friends in the comment section of our collaboration Instagram post. 3. To complete your entry - submit your details below:
settings.ahg_tandcs: Entries close 14 November at 5:00 PM AEDT. The winner will be announced on 15 November at 12:00 PM AEDT and will be chosen at random + notified via email and Instagram. All entrants must follow all three entry steps outlined above to be eligible and in the running for this giveaway. Open to all International entrants. Prices shown are AUD equivalent. By entering this giveaway, you are agreeing to subscribe your email to the mail list of all participating brands; Fella Swim, Robey, and Vacation. Loewe is not affiliated with this giveaway. You may withdraw your consent at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in the emails or SMS you receive. All brands will cover shipping costs individually of their prizes.
